SENT.plain: AIM: To report a successful treatment of an atypical case of pseudotumor cerebri
BACKGROUND: Pseudotumor cerebri is a disorder of raised intracranial pressure
Multiple Case Series have been published about its treatment with sinus stenting
All these cases have had typical presentations
CASE: An atypical fulminant case of pseudotumor cerebri which was treated successfully with venous sinus stenting
CONCLUSION: Venous sinus stenting can be done effectively in atypical cases of pseudotumor cerebri
